name: Cowboy 3030
description:
Step into the rogue future Wild West of Cowboy 3030, where your gunslinging skills will be put to the ultimate test! With souls-like stamina, master gun combat in this immersive 3D third-person roguelike shooter and rise as the hero of 3030. 

This is a pre-alpha build with 1 playable level. Please provide any feedback and bug issues in the comments. Thanks for playing!

Join our Discord to stay updated on all game developments!

Music Composed by James Elsey
